text: Quarten is a municipality in Sarganserland in the canton of St. Gallen, Switzerland. It is above Lake Walen and is divided into villages: Oberterzen, Unterterzen, Quarten, Quinten, Mols, Murg, and Tannenbodenalp. == Gallery == Quinten3.jpg|Quinten Walensee Unterterzen-2.jpg|Unterterzen Murg, straatzicht met de Walense op de achtergrond foto3 2014-07-20 14.23.jpg|Murg, view to a street with lake (the Lake Walen) in background Unterterzen, gemeentehuis in straatzicht foto6 2014-07-20 14.36.jpg|Unterterzen, town hall in the street Mols, die Sankt Antonius von Padua Kirche foto5 2014-07-20 14.53.jpg|Mols church: the Saint Anthony of Padua Church == References == == Other websites == * Quarten Online Official website * Official website of the village of Murg * * * * Category:Municipalities in Sarganserland
title: Quarten
